word_group.brief_definition: 步行距离；行走距离；步行路程
在远处；有一段相当的距离；稍远些
从远处看；从远处；从远距离
坚持下来；在比赛中未被击倒；赛完全部时间；全场当投手；持续
在攻击距离之内；成功的可能性很大

word_group.phrase: distance lends enchantment to the view

bilingual.source: It has a digital display that records your steps, speed and distance.
bilingual.target: 它有一个数字显示屏，可以记录你的步数、速度和距离。

bilingual.source: She realised that one of the greatest benefits of the Internet was its ability to remove the distance that usually exists between people.
bilingual.target: 她意识到互联网的最大好处之一就是能够消除通常存在于人和人之间的距离感。

bilingual.source: After repeating this process a few times, they eventually found the ideal distance where they could feel warm while managing not to hurt each other.
bilingual.target: 重复了几次这个过程后，他们最终找到了一个既能感到温暖又不会伤害彼此的理想距离。

bilingual.source: He is skilled at long-distance snipe.
The frog can hop a long distance.
bilingual.target: 青蛙可以跳跃很远的距离。

bilingual.source: The distance between the two is very short.
He ran the longest distance in the race.
bilingual.target: 他在比赛中跑了最长的距离。

bilingual.source: The distance between them is getting larger.
bilingual.target: 他们之间的距离越来越远。

list.abstract: 《Distance》是2012年Man With A Mission发行的歌曲。
英文单词，距离，路程；远处；疏远；（时间的）间隔，长久，与…保持距离·.....

yingyinNormal.en: The shortest distance between any two points is a straight path.
yingyinNormal.zh: 任意两点间的最短距离是直线。

yingyinNormal.en: Well, now, hold on. What kind of distance are we talking about?
yingyinNormal.zh: 呃，先等等，你说的距离是指哪种？

yingyinNormal.en: It doesn't matter. Look, I promise from now on I will keep my distance from you.
yingyinNormal.zh: 没关系，我保证从今以后我会跟你保持距离。

yingyinNormal.en: You what? Keep your distance. Stay at least three feet away from the glass, and all that.
yingyinNormal.zh: 什么？保持距离站在至少一米开外什么的。

yingyinNormal.en: Yes, and you were right, so I've been keeping my distance to protect him.
yingyinNormal.zh: 对，你说得没错，所以为了保护他，我一直跟他保持距离。

yingyinNormal.en: Mostly we're terrified of them, sir. So we try to keep our distance.
yingyinNormal.zh: 大部分时间我们都很害怕她们，老师。所以我们始终和她们保持距离。

yingyinNormal.en: No. They say it's the same as the distance from the tip of a guy's thumb to the tip of his index finger.
yingyinNormal.zh: 不，是和拇指尖到食指尖的距离相同的。

yingyinNormal.en: Chandler, will you just come in already? Oh no, thank you, I prefer to keep a safe distance from all this merriment.
yingyinNormal.zh: 钱德，你今晚会来吗？不，我喜欢和欢乐保持安全距离。

yingyinNormal.en: And because speed is distance divided by time, Jill actually sees the ball move faster.
yingyinNormal.zh: 因为速度等于距离除以时间，事实上 吉尔所看到球比杰克所看到的移动得更快。

yingyinNormal.en: The rifle is the first weapon you learn how to use, because it lets you keep your distance from the client.
yingyinNormal.zh: 来复枪是你要学习的第一件武器，因为它能让你和目标保持距离。

yingyinNormal.en: Come with me. 40 years ago, I created a formula that altered atomic relative distance. Huh?
yingyinNormal.zh: 跟我来，四十年前，我发明了一个公式，可以改变原子之间的相对距离。什么？

yingyinNormal.en: I went really slow, I kept my distance, and two bottles of wine later, we were making out in my car.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我尽量慢慢来，并且保持距离，然后两瓶红酒下肚，我们就在车里亲热了。

yingyinNormal.en: And if the speed is the same while the distance is different, this means the time taken will be different as well.
yingyinNormal.zh: 如果速度是一样的话，而距离却不一样，那花的时间将也不一样。

yingyinNormal.en: Oh, just seems as though that maybe you have intimacy issues. You know, that you use your humor as a way of keeping people at a distance.
yingyinNormal.zh: 你似乎有亲密上的问题，你用你的幽默和人保持距离。

yingyinNormal.en: I learned how to change the distance between atoms. That's what powers the suit. That's why it works. Wow.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我在研究如何改变原子之间的距离，也是这套战衣的威力所在，这就是它工作的原理。哇。

yingyinNormal.en: We never lost you, Doctor. We've kept our distance. Even helped keep some other interested parties off your scent.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我们一直在关注你，博士，但是保持着距离，甚至暗地里把一些对你感兴趣的人。挡了下来。

yingyinNormal.en: It's not a big deal, Sheldon. It's just, ever since Leonard's been dating Raj's sister, I've had to keep my distance.
yingyinNormal.zh: 这没啥大不了的，谢尔顿，只是自从莱纳德跟拉杰的妹妹在一起之后，我就得跟你们保持距离了。

yingyinNormal.en: Their hometown of Qiqihar is in the far northeast, a distance of 950 miles, a journey that would take 36 hours by conventional transport, but not anymore.
yingyinNormal.zh: 他们的家乡齐齐哈尔在东北深处，一段一千五百多公里的距离。传统的交通工具需要花费三十六小时，而那已是过去。

yingyinNormal.en: When I took over this company for Dr. Pym, I immediately started researching a particle that could change the distance between atoms, while increasing density and strength.
yingyinNormal.zh: 当我从皮姆博士那里接手这家公司后，我立即开始研究一种能够改变原子间距离同时能增加密度和强度的粒子。

yingyinNormal.en: You know, some people might say that it's great that we're trying to make things work long distance. They'd say things like, love is stronger than the miles between you.
yingyinNormal.zh: 你知道吗，有些人可能会说我们俩保持这种异地恋是精神可嘉的事。他们会说爱情不会被你们俩之间的距离所打败。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2012-2023年12年间全国考研试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2012-2023年全国考研英语一和考研英语二共24套考研试卷，包括阅读、完型填空、翻译、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选全国考研考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2012-2023年12年间全国考研英语一和考研英语二试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: n. 距离；间距；赛程的全长；远处；远方；遥远；间隔；远离；冷漠；攻击距离

word_family.mean: adj. 遥远的；久远的；不亲密的；冷淡的；矜持的；远亲的；隐约的；心不在焉的；在特定距离之外的；远处传来的

sense_info_list.en: the amount of space between two places or things

examination_example.sentence: Increase time, <highlight>distance</highlight>, and intensity gradually.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 逐渐增加时间、距离和强度。

examination_example.sentence: Said one recorder of events, "The air at twelve leagues' <highlight>distance</highlight> smelt as sweet as a new-blown garden."
examination_example.sentence_trans: 一位记录事件的人说:“十二里格外的空气闻起来就象新开的花园一样芬芳。”

sense_info_list.en: the more remote part of what is visible or discernible

examination_example.sentence: The majority of which show sitters posing miserably and stiffly in front of painted backdrops, or staring absently into the middle <highlight>distance</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 其中大部分展示了画面中的人在画中的背景前痛苦而僵硬地摆着姿势，或者心不在焉地盯着中间向远处望去。

affix_sense_info.affix_sense_chinese: 名词后缀, 性质, 状况

direction_info.description:
数据源自2016.6-2023.6年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight>考纲释义</highlight>
精选实考、考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2016-2023年51套试卷，包括阅读、听力、翻译等所有题型。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2016-2023年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: n. 距离；间距；赛程的全长；远处；远方；遥远；间隔；远离；冷漠；攻击距离

word_family.mean: adj. 遥远的；久远的；不亲密的；冷淡的；矜持的；远亲的；隐约的；心不在焉的；在特定距离之外的；远处传来的

sense_info_list.en: the amount of space between two places or things

examination_example.sentence: Over 10% of the respondents lied about the <highlight>distance</highlight> they drove.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 超过10%的受访者谎报了他们的驾驶距离。

examination_example.sentence: And as the <highlight>distance</highlight> between their breeding grounds and their food grows, entire colonies could be wiped out.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 随着它们的繁殖地和食物之间距离的增加，整个种群可能会被消灭。

examination_example.sentence: Whales will have to travel long <highlight>distances</highlight> to find food.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 鲸鱼将不得不长途跋涉去寻找食物。

examination_example.sentence: But social <highlight>distancing</highlight> is unique in that it is completely self-sacrificing.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 但保持社交距离是独特的，因为它完全是自我牺牲。

examination_example.sentence: Social <highlight>distancing</highlight> is millions of people making hundreds of sacrifices to keep the elderly alive.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 社交距离是指数百万人为了让老人活着而做出数百个牺牲。

examination_example.sentence: Social <highlight>distancing</highlight> is putting people out of work, canceling school and tanking the stock market.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 社交距离让人们失业、停课、股市暴跌。

sense_info_list.en: the more remote part of what is visible or discernible

examination_example.sentence: For the first time, messages were sent electronically across great <highlight>distances</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 信息第一次以电子方式远距离传送。

examination_example.sentence: Peter Rasmussen is medical director of <highlight>distance</highlight> health at the Cleveland Clinic.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 彼得·拉斯姆森是克里夫兰诊所远程健康医疗主任。

examination_example.sentence: Driving too long a <highlight>distance</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 驾驶距离太远。

examination_example.sentence: For long-<highlight>distance</highlight> travel.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 适合长途旅行。

examination_example.sentence: For example, mobile robots have been programmed to keep a comfortable <highlight>distance</highlight> from humans.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 例如，移动机器人已经被编程为与人类保持舒适的距离。

sense_info_list.en: the amount of space between two places or things

examination_example.sentence: However, the precise effects vary according to whether you engage in short, fast running or long-<highlight>distance</highlight> running.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 然而，精确的效果根据你是从事短跑、快跑还是长跑而有所不同。

exam_freq_info.chinese: 距离; 远处; 远方

direction_info.description:
数据源自2015-2022年8年间全国卷和自主命题省市高考卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2015-2022年全国卷高考试卷，包括阅读、完形、单选、填空、听力、改错、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选各省市考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2015-2022年8年间全国卷和自主命题省市高考卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

sense_info_list.zh: 距离; 远处; 远方

examination_example.sentence: You may have to cover some <highlight>distance</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 你可能要走一段距离。

examination_example.sentence: You need a seat which supports your back and the book should be at the right <highlight>distance</highlight> from your eyes.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 你需要一个能支撑你背部的座位，书本应与你的眼睛保持适当距离。

examination_example.sentence: During the first week, do not think about <highlight>distance</highlight>, but run five minutes longer each day.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 在第一周，不要考虑距离，而是每天多跑5分钟。

affix_sense_info.affix_sense_chinese: 名词后缀, 性质, 状况

exam_freq_info.chinese: 远处; 远方; 遥远

direction_info.description:
数据源自2018-2021年4年间全国各省市中考试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2018-2021年全国重点省市中考试卷，包括听力、阅读、完形、单选、填空、改错、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选各省市考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2018-2021年4年间全国各省市中考试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: n. 距离；间距；赛程的全长；远处；远方；遥远；间隔；远离；冷漠；攻击距离

word_family.mean: adj. 遥远的；久远的；不亲密的；冷淡的；矜持的；远亲的；隐约的；心不在焉的；在特定距离之外的；远处传来的

word_level_phrase_info.brief_definition: 步行距离；行走距离；步行路程
在远处；有一段相当的距离；稍远些
从远处看；从远处；从远距离

examination_example.sentence: If you have to go to the stores, movies, parties, supermarkets, etc, besides wearing masks, remember to keep social <highlight>distance</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 如果你必须去商店、影院、聚会，超市等场所，除非戴口罩，否则要记住保持社交距离。

examination_example.sentence: Gas cars can cover a longer <highlight>distance</highlight> on a full tank than electric cars on a full charge.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 汽油车在满油的情况下可以比电动车在满电的情况下行驶更远的距离。

examination_example.sentence: Bats are the only mammals that can fly a great <highlight>distance</highlight>, but they have another ability.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 蝙蝠是唯一可以远距离飞行的哺乳动物，但它们也有另一项能力。

sense_info_list.zh: 远处; 远方; 遥远

examination_example.sentence: Looking down into the <highlight>distance</highlight> or looking out of the window is a good option.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 低头看向远方或看向窗外是一个不错的选择。

examination_example.sentence: It just seems better from a <highlight>distance</highlight>(远处).
examination_example.sentence_trans: 它只是从远处看起来更好。

examination_example.sentence: A. She stood quietly in <highlight>distance</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 她静静地站在远处。
